mapper.select: SELECT account , pwd , account_type , member_name , email , DATE_FORMAT(registration_date, '%Y.%m.%d') AS registration_date FROM member WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND account = #{account} AND pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (account, pwd, account_type, member_name, email, registration_date) VALUES (#{account}, #{pwd}, #{accountType}, #{memberName}, #{email}, NOW())
